column4: Hey, just installed Ubuntu on my HD from liveCD, and had a question before I reboot. technically, can i chroot the /target (hd prtition im installing to) and basically do anything?
yes, that's the idea behind chrooting
so, I could load up the installation's copy of firefox and tweak it, etc, before booting up the new install?
I don't want to bork it.
hm, well, itloaded, but complains about /var/lib/dbus/machine-id not existing in console.
